nodes.text: Guillotine was the saucer-shaped personal starship of the bounty hunter Embo during the Clone Wars. Embo used the starship to travel to Serenno with his anooba Marrok during an attempt by Boba Fett's syndicate to rescue Quinlan Vos.

The Guillotine was originally designed to appear in the episode "An Old Friend," but was eventually cut out of the episode. Concept art of the ship's cockpit by Russell Chong was posted online on the official Star Wars website, which shows the ship having a mainly green coloring with gold and silver highlights.
